item.title: My home office setup in 2020
item.description: Here is my current setup: Blue Yeti mic, Yeti Compass boom arm Note that the boom arm is meant to carry the shock mount + the mic and since I only mounted the Yeti mic, the spring mechanism is a bit too tight which means the arm tends to go up. I unscrewed the screw in the base of the boom arm at its minimum but the tension is still too high and the boom arm tends to go up.
